abstract.description:
Preprocessed data for the two-lepton/four-lepton analysis example

These files contain only the muon and electron collections, other physics object collections have been discarded. No selection or quality criteria have yet been applied, it has to be done in the subsequent analysis step.

methodology.description: These files contain the muon and electron collections in PAT candidate format derived from the full 2010 RunB Muon primary dataset. No filters are applied, apart from the list of the validated runs.These datasets were produced with the code in

relations.description: The code to produce the files is available at

title: Muons and electrons in PAT candidate format derived from /Mu/Run2010B-Apr21ReReco-v1/AOD primary dataset

usage.description: The data can be further analysed with the analysis example code available in

validation.description: Only the list of validated runs have been accepted.
